name: In Plain Sight (itch) (gsuhonors3260)
description:
Plot: You play as a detective who must help a concerned citizen find his friend before they join a dangerous extremist group and become indoctrinated.

Controls: W for up, A for left, S for down, and D for right; E for interacting with objects and people.

Use the spacebar to skip through dialogue and use the mouse to click on icons and objects

*Note*: This is only a demo and not a completely polished game. Just a proof of concept.
